name: Neon Retro Arcade
description: These body paintings were photographed at the Neon Retro Arcade in Pasadena. The moment I walked in there, I was consumed with overwhelming nostalgia and a tremendous desire to a body paint photoshoot celebrating that. Long story short, I pulled it off, and here are the results. These are two arcade rats that only care about dropping quarters, high scores, and sippin' on their soda pop! no other care in the world!
